ca.projectTOMi.tomi.authorization.interceptor

Class AuthorizationInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.authorization.interceptor.AuthorizationInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor

    @Component
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
public class AuthorizationInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor
    Intercepts HTTP requests and ensures the requesting user has authorization to perform the requested operation.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot
